```{r}
my_data <- fread("full_dataset-release.csv")
```

```{r}
new <- my_data %>%
  group_by(STOCK, DATE) %>%
  summarise(average_polarity = mean(LSTM_POLARITY)) %>%
  filter(STOCK == 'Facebook')


```


```{r}

faang <- my_data %>%
  filter(STOCK %in% c("Facebook", "Apple", "Amazon", "Netflix", "Google"))

```


```{r}
faang <- faang %>%
  group_by(STOCK) %>%
  group_by(DATE)


faang <- faang %>% 
  mutate(ticker = case_when(
    STOCK == "Apple" ~ "AAPL",
    STOCK == "Amazon" ~ "AMZN",
    STOCK == "Netflix" ~ "NFLX",
    STOCK == "Facebook" ~ "META",
    STOCK == "Google" ~ "GOOGL",
    TRUE ~ "Other"
  ))



print(faang)
```
```{r} 
# Define the stock symbol (e.g., Apple Inc.)
symbol <- "AAPL"

# Download historical data using getSymbols
getSymbols(symbol)

# Extract market cap information
market_cap <- Cl(get(symbol)) * Op(get(symbol, env = .GlobalEnv))

# Print market cap information
print(market_cap)

# Download dividend data using getDividends
dividend_data <- getDividends(symbol)

# Print dividend information
print(dividend_data)


```
